title: New Game Mode on PBE suggested bans? (minor spoilers)
body:
If you haven't subscribed to those PBE youtubers such as Brofresco, you should. They tell well info on upcoming skins and even stream games sometimes. If you have, you will already have known of the new game mode coming: Nemesis Draft.
Ofcourse many have heard of it but i was just asking of some good bans and picks for the enemy team to assure a very ez game and Victory. Someitmes the most underrated can be the most op!

replies.body: why would i subscribe to some %%%%ty youtuber when I can just go to s@20 and read all the patch notes there.
agreed, personally i find brofresco is annoying, he tries too hard to hype things up and gets too excited about mediocre things.

My main suggestion, is decide beforehand to give a comp that will be hard to play around, even champs like urgot can be strong in this mode simply cause the fact that ADC's don't come into this game mode.
I'd punch a puppy before i subscribe to Brofresco.. Gotta be the biggest %%%
I have thought up an idea of giving the enemy team champs that do only magic damage (azir, heimer etc) then have everyone get banner of command :3

Personally I think there's going to be a lot of {{champion:6}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:133}} etc, generally the champs considered 'underpowered'. Mind you I'll be ecstatic if I get {{champion:133}}.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MshOMfJY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-28T04:54:25.661+0000)
>
> Personally I think there's going to be a lot of {{champion:6}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:133}} etc, generally the champs considered 'underpowered'. Mind you I'll be ecstatic if I get {{champion:133}}.

my friend main quinns is gold
Good thing I'm not gold then.
ban teemo, yorick, rammus and urgot

Don't pick {{champion:78}} cause she'll kill everyone on your team
Don't pick {{champion:2}} cause he'll wreck your low mobility team
Don't pick {{champion:3}} cause he'll walk up and use his ult

To be honest I'm not sure who to give the enemy, you could try all low damage supports but that might result in them all healing each other up to full hp

> [{quoted}](name=SlimyDan,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MshOMfJY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-28T04:24:16.625+0000)
>

> Don't pick {{champion:3}} cause he'll walk up and use his ult
> 
> To be honest I'm not sure who to give the enemy, you could try all low damage supports but that might result in them all healing each other up to full hp

{{champion:6}}ta be kidding me
